title: The Martian
storyline: During a manned mission to Mars, Astronaut Mark Watney (Matt Damon) is presumed dead after a fierce storm and left behind by his crew

title: Gone Girl
storyline: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne (Ben Affleck) reports that his beautiful wife, Amy (Rosamund Pike), has gone missing.

title: Despicable Me 2
storyline: A mysterious vehicle using a huge magnet steals a highly potent mutagen known as PX-41 from a secret laboratory in the Arctic Circle. The Anti-Villain League (AVL) tries to recruit former supervillain, Gru, to find who stole the mutagen. Gru refuses to help, claiming he is a legitimate businessman (of jams and jellies) now as well as the father of Margo, Edith, and Agnes.
